vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play (patch_9.sol#75-95) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: uint256 wager = wagers[msg.sender];
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play.wager (local variable @ patch_9.sol#79) shadows:
	- PoCGame.wager (function @ patch_9.sol#68-73)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function payout(address winner, uint256 wager) internal {
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.payout.wager (local variable @ patch_9.sol#101) shadows:
	- PoCGame.wager (function @ patch_9.sol#68-73)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.donateToWhale (patch_9.sol#107-111):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) (patch_9.sol#108)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_9.sol#109)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.loseWager (patch_9.sol#113-117):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) (patch_9.sol#114)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_9.sol#115)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: pragma solidity ^0.4.21;
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_9.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (patch_9.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in PoCGame.donateToWhale (patch_9.sol#107-111):
	-require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) patch_9.sol#108
